20110118073614.000|20110118073616.000|CC1|BELONG TO THE BOY SCOUTS AND    
20110118073616.000|20110118073617.000|CC1|COLLECTIVELY THEY SPEND MILLIONS
20110118073617.000|20110118073619.000|CC1|OF HOURS A YEAR OUTDOORS.       
20110118073619.000|20110118073622.000|CC1|ON MOST EXCURSIONS THE GREATEST 
20110118073622.000|20110118073624.000|CC1|HAZARDS SCOUTS FACE ARE MOSQUITO
20110118073624.000|20110118073626.000|CC1|BITES OR CAMPFIRE GHOST STORIES 
20110118073626.000|20110118073628.000|CC1|SCARE, BUT ON SEVERAL

20110118073629.000|20110118073631.000|CC1|BACK TO THE 1990s THINGS HAVE   
20110118073631.000|20110118073633.000|CC1|GONE TERRIBLY WRONG AND THE     
20110118073633.000|20110118073636.000|CC1|QUESTION THEN BECOMES WHO IF

20110118073700.000|20110118073703.000|CC1|17-YEAR-OLD BOY NAMED MICHAEL

20110118073800.000|20110118073801.000|CC1|>> Reporter: MICHAEL'S LAST HIKE
20110118073801.000|20110118073804.000|CC1|WAS SCHEDULED AS A 20-MILER

20110118073807.000|20110118073808.000|CC1|PRESERVE.

20110118073811.000|20110118073813.000|CC1|FIT PHYSICAL CONDITION AND      
20110118073813.000|20110118073815.000|CC1|DETERMINED TO DO THAT HIKE.

20110118073819.000|20110118073824.000|CC1|THE CHURCH TO BE DROPPED OFF AND
20110118073824.000|20110118073825.000|CC1|THE LAST THING HE SAID TO ME WAS
20110118073825.000|20110118073826.000|CC1|I LOVE YOU.                     
20110118073826.000|20110118073827.000|CC1|>> Reporter: THE HIKERS SET OFF 
20110118073827.000|20110118073828.000|CC1|AT APPROXIMATELY 9:00 THAT      
20110118073828.000|20110118073829.000|CC1|MORNING.                        
20110118073829.000|20110118073831.000|CC1|THREE BOYS LED BY SCOUT MASTERS 
20110118073831.000|20110118073834.000|CC1|HAROLD CROMPTON AND ANDREW      
20110118073834.000|20110118073835.000|CC1|SCHMIDT WHO NOTICED THAT THE    
20110118073835.000|20110118073837.000|CC1|HEAT WAS GETTING TO THE BOYS AT 
20110118073837.000|20110118073839.000|CC1|1:00 WHEN THE HIKE WAS HALF     
20110118073839.000|20110118073840.000|CC1|COMPLETE.                       
20110118073840.000|20110118073841.000|CC1|THEY WERE NOT HEATING MUCH      
20110118073841.000|20110118073843.000|CC1|BECAUSE THEY WERE EXTREMELY HOT 
20110118073843.000|20110118073843.000|CC1|CROMPTON TOLD POLICE.           
20110118073843.000|20110118073845.000|CC1|IN HIS OWN HANDWRITING HE       
20110118073845.000|20110118073848.000|CC1|DESCRIBED THE ORDEAL THAT BEGAN 
20110118073848.000|20110118073849.000|CC1|AT MILE 15.                     
20110118073849.000|20110118073851.000|CC1|HE SEEMED TO SEEM DIZZY.        
20110118073851.000|20110118073852.000|CC1|WE HAD HIM SIT DOWN.            
20110118073852.000|20110118073854.000|CC1|AFTER 20 MINUTES HE GOT WORSE.  
20110118073854.000|20110118073856.000|CC1|HE SEEMED TO BE CHOKING.        
20110118073856.000|20110118073857.000|CC1|I TURNED HIM ON HIS SIDE.       
20110118073857.000|20110118073858.000|CC1|HE VOMITED.                     
20110118073858.000|20110118073859.000|CC1|I CLEARED HIS MOUTH.            
20110118073859.000|20110118073900.000|CC1|HE STOPPED BREATHING.           
20110118073900.000|20110118073902.000|CC1|AN HOUR AND A HALF AFTER        
20110118073902.000|20110118073904.000|CC1|STOPPING THE HIKE, HE PLACED A  
20110118073904.000|20110118073905.000|CC1|CALL ON HIS CELL PHONE.         
20110118073905.000|20110118073907.000|CC1|>> 911, WHAT IS THE ADDRESS OF  
20110118073907.000|20110118073908.000|CC1|YOUR EMERGENCY?                 
20110118073908.000|20110118073909.000|CC1|>> THE FLORIDA TRAIL.           
20110118073909.000|20110118073911.000|CC1|WE'RE HIKING IN THE EVERGLADES. 
20110118073911.000|20110118073913.000|CC1|GOT A GUY, HE'S NOT BREATHING.  
20110118073913.000|20110118073914.000|CC1|>> THE GUY'S NOT BREATHING?     
20110118073914.000|20110118073916.000|CC1|>> YES, SIR.                    
20110118073916.000|20110118073918.000|CC1|>> Reporter: CROMPTON HAD BEEN  
20110118073918.000|20110118073921.000|CC1|PERFORMING CPR ON HIM FOR 45    
20110118073921.000|20110118073923.000|CC1|MINUTES BY THE TIME THE RESCUE  
20110118073923.000|20110118073923.000|CC1|HELICOPTER REACHED HIM.         
20110118073923.000|20110118073925.000|CC1|BY THEN HE HAD NO PULSE.        
20110118073925.000|20110118073926.000|CC1|HE WAS AIR-LIFTED OUT BUT HALF  
20110118073926.000|20110118073927.000|CC1|AN HOUR LATER, HE WAS DECLARED  
20110118073927.000|20110118073929.000|CC1|DEAD.

20110118073931.000|20110118073933.000|CC1|ON A HOT DAY IN THE EVERGLADES. 
20110118073933.000|20110118073934.000|CC1|>> NOW A MOTHER AND FATHER --   
20110118073934.000|20110118073935.000|CC1|>> Reporter: THIS IS HOW THE    
20110118073935.000|20110118073936.000|CC1|COMMUNITY LEARNED ABOUT HIS     
20110118073936.000|20110118073938.000|CC1|DEATH BUT HIS PARENTS' ACCOUNT

20110118073941.000|20110118073944.000|CC1|>> THE SHERIFF KNOCKED ON THE

20110118073950.000|20110118073951.000|CC1|HE DIED.

20110118074014.000|20110118074016.000|CC1|>> Reporter: HAVING TO PLACE    
20110118074016.000|20110118074019.000|CC1|THAT CALL WAS NO DOUBT ANOTHER  
20110118074019.000|20110118074020.000|CC1|NIGHTMARE THAT THOSE TWO LEAD   
20110118074020.000|20110118074021.000|CC1|THE SCOUT TROOP AND HAD BEEN

20110118074024.000|20110118074024.000|CC1|PARENTS.

20110118074027.000|20110118074028.000|CC1|MICHAEL'S PARENTS.              
20110118074028.000|20110118074029.000|CC1|>> THEY'RE SUPPOSED TO BE       
20110118074029.000|20110118074031.000|CC1|TRAINED TO RECOGNIZE, YOU KNOW, 
20110118074031.000|20110118074033.000|CC1|SIGNS AND SYMPTOMS.             
20110118074033.000|20110118074034.000|CC1|AT SOME POINT HE TOLD THEM HE   
20110118074034.000|20110118074036.000|CC1|DIDN'T FEEL WELL AND THEY

20110118074040.000|20110118074043.000|CC1|CALL IT WAS AN HOUR AND A HALF. 
20110118074043.000|20110118074043.000|CC1|>> Reporter: YOU WERE COUNTING  
20110118074043.000|20110118074045.000|CC1|ON THEIR EXPERTISE.             
20110118074045.000|20110118074048.000|CC1|>> RIGHT, NOT TO PRESS ON       
20110118074048.000|20110118074049.000|CC1|REGARDLESS FOR ANOTHER FIVE     
20110118074049.000|20110118074052.000|CC1|MILES IF YOU'RE SHOWING SIGNS OF
20110118074052.000|20110118074054.000|CC1|HEAT AND DISORIENTATION.        
20110118074054.000|20110118074055.000|CC1|>> Reporter: THE SUIT THAT NAMES
20110118074055.000|20110118074058.000|CC1|THE SCOUTMASTERS AND THE LOCAL  
20110118074058.000|20110118074059.000|CC1|CHURCH THAT SPONSORS MICHAEL'S  
20110118074059.000|20110118074101.000|CC1|TROOP AND THE BOY SCOUTS OF     
20110118074101.000|20110118074103.000|CC1|AMERICA WAS FILED BY MARK       
20110118074103.000|20110118074104.000|CC1|SYLVESTER, WHO BROUGHT THIS CASE
20110118074104.000|20110118074105.000|CC1|TO OUR ATTENTION.               
20110118074105.000|20110118074107.000|CC1|>> THIS IS NOT WAY CONDEMNATION 
20110118074107.000|20110118074109.000|CC1|OF THE BOY SCOUTS.              
20110118074109.000|20110118074112.000|CC1|THEY ARE A VERY WORTHWHILE      
20110118074112.000|20110118074115.000|CC1|ORGANIZATION AND INSTILL GOOD   
20110118074115.000|20110118074117.000|CC1|VALUES IN OUR CHILDREN BUT AT   
20110118074117.000|20110118074119.000|CC1|THE SAME TIME THEY HAVE FLAWS.  
20110118074119.000|20110118074120.000|CC1|CHILDREN ARE DYING AND BEING    
20110118074120.000|20110118074121.000|CC1|SEVERELY INJURED.               
20110118074121.000|20110118074123.000|CC1|THIS IS NOT THE FIRST DEATH ON A
20110118074123.000|20110118074124.000|CC1|HIKE.                           
20110118074124.000|20110118074125.000|CC1|>> I CAN'T IMAGINE FOR A PARENT 
20110118074125.000|20110118074126.000|CC1|TO LOSE THEIR SON BUT WHAT I CAN
20110118074126.000|20110118074130.000|CC1|TELL YOU IS THE BOY SCOUTS IS SO
20110118074130.000|20110118074131.000|CC1|PROACTIVE IN EVERYTHING THEY DO 
20110118074131.000|20110118074132.000|CC1|WITH REGARDS TO SAFETY.         
20110118074132.000|20110118074133.000|CC1|THERE'S RISKS IN EVERYTHING WE  
20110118074133.000|20110118074134.000|CC1|DO IN LIFE.                     
20110118074134.000|20110118074136.000|CC1|>> Reporter: KATHY BURNS IS ONE 
20110118074136.000|20110118074138.000|CC1|OF A TRIO OF LEADERS THE        
20110118074138.000|20110118074139.000|CC1|ORGANIZATION ASSEMBLED WHEN WE  
20110118074139.000|20110118074140.000|CC1|ASKED FOR AN INTERVIEW.         
20110118074140.000|20110118074142.000|CC1|THE SCOUTS INSISTED THAT IT BE  
20110118074142.000|20110118074143.000|CC1|THREE PEOPLE AND SET 30 MINUTES 
20110118074143.000|20110118074144.000|CC1|AS A LIMIT.                     
20110118074144.000|20110118074147.000|CC1|>> AND MY MOM HAD TWO SONS THAT 
20110118074147.000|20110118074148.000|CC1|HAD GONE THROUGH THE PROGRAM    
20110118074148.000|20110118074149.000|CC1|MANY THEY'RE BOTH EAGLE SCOUTS. 
20110118074149.000|20110118074151.000|CC1|>> Reporter: CAN YOU TELL ME    
20110118074151.000|20110118074152.000|CC1|WITH COMPLETE CERTAINLY AND     
20110118074152.000|20110118074153.000|CC1|SECURITY THAT I CAN PUT MY KIDS 
20110118074153.000|20110118074155.000|CC1|INTO A SCOUTING PROGRAM AND     
20110118074155.000|20110118074156.000|CC1|SOMETHING LIKE THIS ISN'T GOING 
20110118074156.000|20110118074157.000|CC1|TO HAPPEN?                      
20110118074157.000|20110118074158.000|CC1|>> ABSOLUTELY.                  
20110118074158.000|20110118074159.000|CC1|THIS IS A SAFE PROGRAM.         
20110118074159.000|20110118074200.000|CC1|>> Reporter: MICHAEL'S CASE THEY
20110118074200.000|20110118074202.000|CC1|SAID REASONABLY THEY COULD NOT  
20110118074202.000|20110118074203.000|CC1|DISCUSS AS IT'S NOW IN          
20110118074203.000|20110118074204.000|CC1|LITIGATION.                     
20110118074204.000|20110118074207.000|CC1|BUT THE ADELMANS' ATTORNEY SAID 
20110118074207.000|20110118074209.000|CC1|THE SCOUTS HAVE BEEN NEGLIGENT  
20110118074209.000|20110118074211.000|CC1|GENT BEFORE AND POINT OUT HALF A
20110118074211.000|20110118074214.000|CC1|DOZEN CASES OF SCOUTS DYING     
20110118074214.000|20110118074216.000|CC1|DURING ACTIVITIES GOING BACK TO 
20110118074216.000|20110118074217.000|CC1|THE 1990s, STRUCK IN LIGHTNING
